channel.title: Npc dialogue problem
channel.description:
Hello, I'm new into java and I'm currently doing a personal server.
So I have experienced a problem with the npc dialogue, I tried alot of searching but I found nothing about how to solve this problem I'm having. When I click on an npc, it talks but when I click "click here to continue" the dialogue keeps repeating itself and it's happening with all the other npc dialogues.
Help is appreciated, thanks.

item.title: Npc dialogue problem
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Blawan:

I think this is a Delta source

You can try using mine but I doubt you’ll know how to get it too work

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=663370.20

Another option is this dialogue system made for allstar(which is pretty much like delta) it’s not amazing but it’s a lot better

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,626987.0.html

Read full topic
